1.0.name: wordpress/woocommerce-mpay24-gateway
1.0.description:
Features

  • Uses mPAY24 PHP files (version 2013-01-17), follows mPAY24 specification (version 2013-02-22)
  • Using the mPAY24 payment page to integrate in website
  • Switching between DEV and PROD mPAY24 environment with SOAP logins
  • Supports all payment methods of mPAY24
  • Languages available for Wordpress Admin: EN, DE
  • Languages available for payment page: BG, CS, DE, EN, ES, FR, HU, NL (no real localisation)
  • Supported currency in payment page: EUR
  • no mPAY24 proSafe Support
  • default styling for payment page

mPAY24

If there are newer mPAY24 PHP Files you can replace the files in the folder MPay24. If you want to extend the functionality (e.g. add styling for payment page) you have to edit class-wc-mpay24-shop.php
